mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MANAGEMENT_TIME_DAY (ID, ONE_THING_CALENDAR, TO_DO_LIST, GRATITUDE_DIARY, AFFIRMATION, DAY, USER_ID) VALUES (#{id}, #{oneThingCalendar}, #{toDoList}, #{gratitudeDiary}, #{affirmation}, #{day}, #{user.id})
mapper.select: SELECT *,u.fullname FROM MANAGEMENT_TIME_DAY m INNER JOIN USER u ON m.user_id = u.id WHERE m.ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM MANAGEMENT_TIME_DAY m INNER JOIN USER u ON m.user_id = u.id WHERE m.USER_ID = #{userId} AND m.DAY = #{day}
